product_name: Bison Designs Stainless-Steel Biner with Bottle Opener Keychain
long_description: The Stainless-Steel Biner with Bottle Opener keychain from Bison Designs holds your keys and opens your favorite bottled beverages when thirst lingers. Made from stainless steel for durability and good looks. Not intended for climbing.
short_description: The Stainless-Steel Biner with Bottle Opener keychain from Bison Designs holds your keys and opens your favorite bottled beverages when thirst lingers.
